final:
Input1: A woman was charged on Thursday (May 9) with the murder of a 56-year-old man at a condominium along Beach Road. Li Ye, a 37-year-old Chinese national, is accused of causing the death of Lim Lai Guan in a unit at City Gate Residences at about 1.40am on May 8. Li was arrested at the scene and a knife was seized. 

Input2: A woman was charged on Monday (May 16) with the murder of a 56-year-old man at a terrace along Sand Street. Li Ye, a 37-year-old Chinese national, is accused of causing the death of Lim Lai Guan in a unit at Merlion House at about 9.20pm on April 30. Li was arrested at the scene and a gun was seized.
